text:
Atlas Obscura | Senior Product Manager | Brooklyn, NY | ONSITE | Full-time

Atlas Obscura is seeking a Senior Product Manager to join our growing, Brooklyn-based team. You'll lead a dedicated group of developers and designers to create inspirational online experiences while helping grow revenue and build a successful business. For more than 5 million monthly visitors, atlasobscura.com is already a beloved portal for unexpected stories, amazing events, and undiscovered places both near and far; the Senior Product Manager will succeed by sharing even more wonder with even more users!

More info and apply: http://www.atlasobscura.com/jobs/senior-product-manager
